Iâ€™m creating this blog site to record my progress in the Data Science space and also improve my writing and communication skills. During my free time, i pick up language learning. I self studied Spanish to conversational fluency and i am doing the same in German. My goal is to speak about 10 languages in my lifetime ğŸ˜…
            Currently, Iâ€™m quite proficient in using the R programming language to perform some Data Analytics task. This blog was done and is managed in R. Iâ€™m also good with SQL ,Python, and Tableau. Before the end of the year, I plan to acquire some extra skills like dbt, BigQuery, e.t.c and to also get better at my current skills.
            Iâ€™ll also be working on some personal projects and documenting my progress here.
            I hope my posts would help someone out there.
